/* USE : PwdManageMapper.getPwdManageList */
SELECT emp.*
FROM (
SELECT 'H' AS EMP_ORGN_FG, tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, '' AS STORE_CD, '' AS STORE_NM, the.EMP_NO, the.EMP_NM AS USER_NM, the.USER_ID, the.SERVICE_FG, the.WEB_USE_YN, the.MP_NO, '' AS EMAIL_ADDR, '' AS ADDR, tho.AGENCY_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE the INNER JOIN TB_HQ_OFFICE tho ON the.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcn ON the.SERVICE_FG = tcn.NMCODE_CD AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '008'
AND tho.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd}
AND the.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm} || '%'
AND the.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{userId}||'%'
AND the.EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{userNm}||'%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'S' AS EMP_ORGN_FG, tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tme.EMP_NO, tme.EMP_NM AS USER_NM, tme.USER_ID, tme.SERVICE_FG, tme.WEB_USE_YN, tme.MP_NO, tme.EMAIL_ADDR, tme.ADDR || tme.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR, tms.AGENCY_CD FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme INNER JOIN TB_MS_STORE tms ON tme.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_HQ_OFFICE tho ON tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcn ON tme.SERVICE_FG = tcn.NMCODE_CD AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '008' WHERE 1=1
AND tms.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd}
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm} || '%'
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||#{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm} || '%'
AND tme.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{userId}||'%'
AND tme.EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{userNm}||'%'
) emp WHERE 1=1
AND emp.EMP_ORGN_FG = #{empOrgnFg}
AND emp.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||#{storeCd}||'%'
AND emp.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm} || '%'
AND emp.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{userId}||'%'
AND emp.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{userNm}||'%'
WHERE emp.EMP_ORGN_FG = #{empOrgnFg}
ORDER BY emp.EMP_ORGN_FG ASC, emp.HQ_OFFICE_CD ASC, emp.STORE_CD ASC, emp.USER_NM
